messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where do hybrids typically inhabit?
remote coastal villages
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can happen to a hybrid during the final transformations?
either learns to embrace their monstrous heritage or goes mad
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are some attempts made by Deep Ones to interact with hybrids?
to lure hybrids to their lairs or places of safety
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many hybrids do not undergo the final metamorphosis?
about 10% of hybrids
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of Deep Ones supervising the final metamorphosis of a hybrid?
to ensure the hybrid is appropriately schooled in their shared heritage
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where do hybrids typically inhabit?
remote coastal villages
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to hybrids that do not complete the transformation?
they are doomed to spend the rest of their life as a half-human half-deep one
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many percent of hybrids do not complete the transformation?
about 10%
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a further 10% of hybrids that do not undergo the metamorphosis?
the deep one genes essentially missing a generation—only to manifest in a future descendent
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to deep ones who supervise the final metamorphosis?
they can supervise the final metamorphosis and ensure the hybrid is appropriately schooled in their shared heritage
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long can hybrids stay underwater until they undergo the full change?
until they have undergone the full change into a deep one
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average damage bonus for Deep One Hybrids?
none
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the chance of older hybrids knowing spells?
10% chance of knowing 1D3 spells
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many attacks per round can Deep One Hybrids make?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the starting HP of a Deep One Hybrid?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Dodge value for the creature in the text?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Armor value for the creature in the text?
None
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the Skills for the creature in the text?
Jump 45%, Listen 50%, Stealth 46%, Swim 60%
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much Sanity points are lost to see a deep one hybrid?
0/1D4 Sanity points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the characteristics of Dholes in the text?
Gigantic wormlike burrowing horrors, not native to Earth, dislike light, and have riddled and laid waste to several other worlds.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are dholes rarely seen in?
daylight
You are a helpful AI assistant.
In what planets are dholes seen in daylight?
planets that they have thoroughly conquered
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Are there any unknown relations between dholes and other creatures?
yes, an unknown relation between dholes and chthonians may exist
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What similar creatures exist in the Dreamlands?
bholes
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of dice are used in the rolls?
various types of dice, including 10-sided, 1-sided, 4-sided, and 6-sided dice
